data.name: Space Fuel
data.detailed_description:
Space Fuel is a bite-sized arcade shoot 'em up. Pilot your ship through waves of enemy bullets!



  • Defeat 4 unique BOSSES:
    You will encounter 4 BOSSES that you should defeat to get to the next stage. If you beat them all, then you will loop back to the start, but this time BOSSES will be stronger.

  • 4 different enemy ships and patterns:

    Fight different enemy ships with unique weapons and attack patterns

  • Try all 5 different power-ups:

    • Double shot
    • Triple shot
    • Machine gun
    • Big gun
    • And even... LASER!

    • Beat your high score:
      See how far you can go. Meet and defeat BOSS at the end of each stage. Beat your high score.

data.short_description: Bite-sized arcade shmup. Slam enemies, beat Bosses, get power-ups and repeat! Pilot your ship through deep space.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Dual core 64-bit
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core 64-bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Dual core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

Recommended:

  • Processor: Quad core

  • Storage: 512 MB available space
